accuracy.description: The accuracy of the solution provided by the system, comparing its response to the correct answer.

completeness.description: The degree to which the response addresses all aspects of the math problem.

clarity.description: How clear and easy to understand the solution provided by the system is.

conciseness.description: Whether the solution provided by the system is free of unnecessary information and steps.

correct_reasoning.description: The extent to which the system's response demonstrates correct mathematical reasoning.

time_efficiency.description: The amount of time taken by the system to provide the solution.
